name: Intruders of the Stars
description:
A Space Invaders Clone made with Phaser.js in a 48h Hackathon.

Alternatively, you can play it here too: http://intruders.surge.sh

If you like it, please vote here: https://wantoo.io/vanhackathon/5496/intruders-of-the-stars/

The source code is available at: http://github.com/brucecantarim/intruders-of-the-stars

I'll be adding more features, such as mobile support, boss fights and new levels soon enough. ;)

Wanna get in touch? Here's my Linkedin: http://br.linkedin.com/in/brucecantarim

Cheers!

Bruce Cantarim
